thread.title: BRIEF-National General Expects Q4 Results To Include About $63-$65 Mln In Losses

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-National General Expects Q4 Results To Include About $63-$65 Mln In Losses
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - National General Holdings Corp:
* NATIONAL GENERAL HOLDINGS CORP - EXPECTS ITS Q4 2017 RESULTS TO INCLUDE APPROXIMATELY $63-$65 MILLION IN LOSSES
* NATIONAL GENERAL- EXPECTS ITS Q4 2017 RESULTS TO INCLUDE ABOUT $63-$65 MILLION IN LOSSES RELATING TO FIRES IN NORTHERN & SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA IN QUARTER
* NATIONAL GENERAL HOLDINGS -‚Äç FALL IN CORPORATE TAX RATE TO CAUSE ONE-TIME NON-CASH TAX CHARGE OF ABOUT $20 MILLION-$30 MILLION,AFTER-TAX,TO BE RECORDED IN Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
